name: Vertigo And Ear Clinic
overview:
An advanced center for diagnosis and rehabilitation of vertigo, hearing and balance disorders.

Vertigo and ear clinic in Jaipur is one of the Finest ENT clinic in Jaipur with world class facilities that are needed for an ENT hospital in a city.

Dr. Anita Bhandari is a consultant neurotologist practicing in Jaipur,Rajasthan. She has done her postgraduation M.S.[ENT] from SMS Medical College, Jaipur. She has done a fellowship in Otology and Neurotology from Singapore. She is Director of Dr. Anita Bhandari’s Vertigo and Ear Clinic and working as Senior Consultant at Jain ENT Hospital.

Dr. Anita Bhandari’s Vertigo and Ear Clinic is an advanced modern facility with dedicated staff to manage patients of vertigo, hearing loss and dizziness.
